fields.name: step_name
fields.label: Step name
fields.help:
[required] An human readable short name for the step.
E.g. K562_R1_RNA-seq_quantification.

fields.name: processed_data_type
fields.label: Step type
fields.help: [required] Determines the type of processing performed in this step (e.g. quantification, calling, etc.).

fields.name: files_location
fields.label: Output files
fields.help: [required] The location for the generated files.

fields.name: step_id
fields.label: Step ID
fields.help: Identify uniquely this step in the system [Autogenerated].

fields.name: submission_date
fields.label: Submission date
fields.help: [required] Date when the information was added.

fields.name: last_edition_date
fields.label: Last edition
fields.help: [required] The last time the information was edited.

fields.name: step_owners
fields.label: Owners
fields.help: [required] Only owners can edit the information of the step.

fields.name: software
fields.label: Software
fields.help: [required] The software or tool used in this step (if any). E.g. Cufflinks, HTSeq, custom script,...

fields.name: used_data
fields.label: Input files
fields.help: Identifies the input files for this step. Usually input files are correspond to the output of previous steps.

fields.name: reference_data
fields.label: Reference files
fields.help: Identifies the files used as reference for this step (if any). E.g. a reference genome for mapping.

fields.name: software_configuration
fields.label: Software configuration
fields.help: Here you can type the configuration, settings, params or event the script used to run the software.

fields.name: results
fields.label: Observations/Results
fields.help: Describes the results of the current step.
